verses.name: Leviticus 13:7
verses.text: But if the scab spread much abroad in the skin, after that he hath been seen of the priest for his cleansing, he shall be seen of the priest again:

verses.name: Leviticus 13:8
verses.text: And if the priest see that, behold, the scab spreadeth in the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is a leprosy.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:9
verses.text: When the plague of leprosy is in a man, then he shall be brought unto the priest;
